channel.title: Sannin Arena Items
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sannin Arena Items"

item.title: Re: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded: Where do I go to buy these items?

item.title: Re: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded: Roll of tickets are a prize wheel uncommon now too.

item.title: Re: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded:
These items, barring the Roll of Tickets, have been removed.

The Rol is now Sp. Jonin and higher to buy. This is merely a stopgap until another non-random method to win a Roll is put into play.

item.title: Re: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded:
Huh. That means that their base prices are Duelist's Aura: 1 200 000 Ryo and Duelist's Eye 2 000 000 Ryo.

That's interesting, since the Reputation price of Duelist's Eye is exactly twice that of Duelist's Aura for exactly twice the effect. Meaning that if you're going the Ryo route, you should definitely buy the Eye before you buy the Aura.

item.title: Re: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded:
MoonMaker Potion: 600000 Ryo
Roll of Tickets: 8000 Ryo
Duelist's Aura (Permanent Item): 960000 Ryo
Duelist's Eye (Permanent Item): 1600000 Ryo

EDIT: These prices are after General Store.

item.title: Re: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded: I can't check either, but I heard lots of grumblings about being able to buy a potion that gives you a Full Moon Waning, and you can also buy Duelist Eye and Duelist Aura. My understanding is that to get everything you need over 2,000,000 ryo. It's cheaper to do it in the arena, even if you're losing all the time.

item.title: Re: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded: I just happened to see the one at 600k before I looped yesterday, sorry â€¦ but they're probably all that price.

item.title: Sannin Arena Items
item.content:encoded: Could someone at Sannin level list arena items you can now buy and costs for them .
